message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire this valuable asset. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1000000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1100000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
